description: ​Join us in Bangkok during Devcon SEA for ETHScale, a half-day conference focused on the current innovations and future evolution of Ethereum. This event will gather leading experts from the bleeding edge of the Ethereum ecosystem. Don’t miss out as they discuss critical topics such as the latest in Preconfirmations, MEV, Restaking, Scaling, VC insights and an exciting debate on Ethereum vs Solana.

sessions.name: Session 1: Preconfirmations and the future of ETH
sessions.description:
​1:00 PM - 1:15 PM: Registration & Reception

​1:15 PM - 1:30 PM: Keynote: Guest Speaker

​1:30 PM - 2:00 PM: Panel: Preconfs and the Future of PBS

​2:00 PM - 2:30 PM: Panel: Current status and issues of MEV in Ethereum

​2:30 PM - 3:00 PM: Break (Networking, coffee, food)

sessions.name: Session 2: Aligning Ethereum as a Force for Good
sessions.description:
​3:00 PM - 3:30 PM: Panel: Restaking: is it too crowded, or just starting?

​3:30 PM - 3:45 PM: Panel: VC Insights, Scaling, and where the money is going?

​3:45 PM - 4:20 PM: Debate: Ethereum vs Solana ecosystem

​4:20 PM - 5:00 PM: Networking, Free & Easy
